duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and coordinate the planning, organizing, training, and leadership necessary to achieve stated objectives in sales, costs, employee retention, guest service, and satisfaction, food quality, cleanliness, and sanitation of the restaurant’s dining room and kitchen areas.
Required background of general food and beverage knowledge, involving at least 2 years of front-of-the-house operations and/or general management positions in a hotel or resort setting.
Experience in full-service restaurant and supervisory experience of staff is a must.
At least 2 years of directly related experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
